Serialized Form

  • Package <Unnamed>

    • Class BlackjackClient extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • aceVal
          int aceVal
          Ace value chosen by the player that is added to the hand total.
        • blackjackHost
          String blackjackHost
          Stores the IP address of the server
        • connection
          Socket connection
          Connection between the client and the server.
        • displayArea
          JTextArea displayArea
          Text area that will display any outputs of the game including any card that is drawn, game results, etc.
        • handTotal
          int handTotal
          Total of this players current hand
        • hitButton
          JButton hitButton
          Button that represents the player requesting to be dealt a new card.
        • input
          Scanner input
          Stores any string read from the stream between the server and the clients.
        • isTurn
          boolean isTurn
          Indicates if it is this players turn
        • output
          Formatter output
          Outputs a message to the stream for the server to read.
        • PLAYER_ONE
          String PLAYER_ONE
          Constant to define player one using a string
        • PLAYER_TWO
          String PLAYER_TWO
          Constant to define player two using a string
        • playerID
          JTextField playerID
          Text field that displays the player number.
        • playerNum
          String playerNum
          Player number of this client
        • popup
          JOptionPane popup
          Dialog window that allows the user to choose between the two ace values if one is drawn.
        • standButton
          JButton standButton
          Button that indicates the player wanting to end their turn with the current hand they have.
        • window
          JFrame window
          New JFrame for the dialog window to show up on.

    • Class BlackjackServer extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • blackjackServer
          ServerSocket blackjackServer
          Creates a server to let other players connect to it.
        • currentPlayer
          int currentPlayer
          Current player
        • dealerPlayed
          int dealerPlayed
          Indicates if the dealer has played yet. 0 if they have not, 1 if they have.
        • dealerScore
          int dealerScore
          Dealer score that is updated after each card is drawn
        • gameLock
          Lock gameLock
          Locks the game for synchronization purposes.
        • otherPlayerTurn
          Condition otherPlayerTurn
          Waits for the other players turn to be over
        • outputWin
          JTextArea outputWin
          Text area that displays drawn cards, server status, or game results.
        • playerConnected
          Condition playerConnected
          Indicates if both players are connected or not.
        • playerID
          JTextField playerID
          Text area showing the player ID. in this case the dealer.
        • players
          BlackjackServer.Player[] players
          Each player is stored in this array.
        • popup
          JOptionPane popup
          Dialog window that allows the user to choose between the two ace values if one is drawn.
        • runGame
          ExecutorService runGame
          Executes the run method in Player class.
        • winCondition
          int winCondition
          Condition that is set in the gameOver method that will indicate which method should be printed out to the dealer text area.
        • window
          JFrame window
          New JFrame for the dialog window to show up on.
